tv.name: Schitt's Creek
tv.commentary: This is some good TV right here, hilarious - on par with Seinfield (imho). Makes me almost consider moving to the middle of nowhere (keyword: almost).

tv.name: Homeland
tv.commentary: Riveting political drama - giving it a minus because the characters are so hate-able

tv.name: Love is Blind
tv.commentary: I'm a sucker for trash reality TV and this takes the (garbage) cake.  The melodrama from a certian character (cough cough G, cough cough) brings this down. Sorry not sorry.
